Reply.name: Dynamic01
Reply.text: As-Salamu alaykum, brother!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000021
Reply.text: Looks like I got the wrong door.

Reply.name: Dynamic01_plYes0
Reply.text: Of course, I accept.

Reply.name: Dynamic01_plNo0
Reply.text: I'd prefer to decline.

Reply.name: Dynamic01_Destroy00
Reply.text: Alaykumu as-salam! Is there work for me?

Reply.name: Dynamic01_Destroy00_npc0
Reply.text: A repeat-offending thief is at large in the area. The bounty on his head is %3d.

Reply.name: Dynamic01_Destroy01
Reply.text: Alaykumu as-salam! Is there work for me?

Reply.name: Dynamic01_Destroy01_npc0
Reply.text: Someone is burning crops and poisoning wells. Most likely an enemy spy. Kill him and you'll receive %3d.

Reply.name: Dynamic01_Destroy02
Reply.text: Alaykumu as-salam! Is there work for me?

Reply.name: Dynamic01_Destroy02_npc0
Reply.text: A madman is riding through the countryside, setting ambushes and scaring villagers. He's not very dangerous, but people are complaining. Deal with him, and %3d is yours.

Reply.name: Dynamic01_Reach00
Reply.text: Alaykumu as-salam! Is there work for me?

Reply.name: Dynamic01_Reach00_npc0
Reply.text: You need to deliver some research data and samples to settlement %2n. You will be paid upon arrival. %3d is a fine reward for such a minor task.

Reply.name: Dynamic01_Reach01
Reply.text: Alaykumu as-salam! Is there work for me?

Reply.name: Dynamic01_Reach01_npc0
Reply.text: We've prepared a small parcel to village %2n. Deliver it when you pass by. It's not urgent. Once done, they’ll pay you %3d.

Reply.name: Dynamic01_Convoy00
Reply.text: Alaykumu as-salam! Is there work for me?

Reply.name: Dynamic01_Convoy00_npc0
Reply.text: The roads have become unsafe, and a friend of mine needs to get to %2n. Protect him along the way – and you'll receive %3d upon arrival.

Reply.name: Dynamic01_Convoy01
Reply.text: Alaykumu as-salam! Is there work for me?

Reply.name: Dynamic01_Convoy01_npc0
Reply.text: Some traders are establishing commerce with a neighboring town and transporting sample goods. Escort them to village %2n and make sure no one follows. Oh, and the reward is %3d.

Reply.name: EndDlg11
Reply.text: Alaykumu as-salam! Is there work for me?

Reply.name: EndDlg22
Reply.text: Alaykumu as-salam! What's new?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_0000171
Reply.text: Believe it or not, everything's fine! There's even nothing to offer!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_0000181
Reply.text: Too bad. Well, I'll drop by another time.

Reply.name: Dynamic01_Peace00
Reply.text: I’ve run into a problem: I had a quarrel with faction %2b...

Reply.name: Dynamic01_Peace00_npc0
Reply.text: Seems like you really made %2b declare you their blood enemy... I have some connections, so for %3d percent of your current funds, I can speak up for you at the city council.

Reply.name: Dynamic01_Peace01
Reply.text: This time I need help. %2b and I couldn't reach an agreement on one matter, and now...

Reply.name: Dynamic01_Peace01_npc0
Reply.text: I know that %2b refuses to deal with you. For a modest fee of %3d percent of your current funds, I can help you gain some respect among them.

Reply.name: Dynamic01_Hunt00
Reply.text: Alaykumu as-salam! Is there work for me?

Reply.name: Dynamic01_Hunt00_npc0
Reply.text: Hunting season on bandits has been declared. Destroying each hostile vehicle will earn you %3d. Payment is made after the hunt ends.

Reply.name: Dynamic01_Hunt01
Reply.text: Alaykumu as-salam! Is there work for me?

Reply.name: Dynamic01_Hunt01_npc0
Reply.text: Bandits have lost all shame! They raid our territories like they're going to their own warehouse. We must teach them a good lesson. Shoot down a few, let them fear us. Finish within the deadline – and you'll get %3d for each of them.

Reply.name: Dynamic00
Reply.text: Hello, traveler!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000020
Reply.text: Sorry, I think I've come to the wrong place.

Reply.name: Dynamic00_plYes0
Reply.text: I agree!

Reply.name: Dynamic00_plNo0
Reply.text: I'd rather not.

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Destroy00
Reply.text: Do you have any work for me to do?

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Destroy00_npc0
Reply.text: A thief that was caught several times started his illicit activity once again. Probably, the only way to make him stop stealing is to kill him. Help us and we'll reward you with %3d coins.

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Destroy01
Reply.text: Do you have any work for me to do?

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Destroy01_npc0
Reply.text: We've noticed someone burning our crops and poisoning our wells. It's probably an enemy spy. Kill him and you'll get %3d as a reward.

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Destroy02
Reply.text: Do you have any work for me to do?

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Destroy02_npc0
Reply.text: There is a madman riding in the neighbourhood, ambushing and scaring the villagers. He's not very dangerous, but people complain. If you take him down, %3d coins are yours.

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Reach00
Reply.text: Do you have any work for me to do?

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Reach00_npc0
Reply.text: We collected several pieces of precious machinery. Deliver them to %2n. Local technicians will pay %3d coins for your work.

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Reach01
Reply.text: Do you have any work for me to do?

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Reach01_npc0
Reply.text: We've been putting together a package that need to be delivered to %2n. Deliver it whenever you're passing through. It's not urgent. You'll be paid %3d coins when it's done.

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Convoy00
Reply.text: Do you have any work for me to do?

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Convoy00_npc0
Reply.text: It is dangerous to travel alone. A friend of mine really needs to go to %2n. Make sure he reaches it safely and you'll get %3d coins.

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Convoy01
Reply.text: Do you have any work for me to do?

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Convoy01_npc0
Reply.text: A local is establishing a trade route with %2n. Rivals want to spoil his plan. Help him to get to his destination safely and %3d coins are yours.

Reply.name: EndDlg1
Reply.text: Do you have any work for me to do?

Reply.name: EndDlg2
Reply.text: Any news?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000017
Reply.text: Can you believe it, everything is OK! So your services are not needed at the moment.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000018
Reply.text: It's a pity. Well, I'll come again later.

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Peace00
Reply.text: I've got a problem: I fell out with %2b group...

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Peace00_npc0
Reply.text: You did a hell of job making %2b hate you! I have a couple of acquaintances among them so I may be able to improve your reputation a bit for mere %3d percent of your money.

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Peace01
Reply.text: I need your help. We've got some irresolvable issues with %2b and now...

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Peace01_npc0
Reply.text: I know that the %2b don't want to have anything to do with you. For a modest fee of %3d of your monetary possessions, I might perhaps be able to help you gain some semblance of credibility among them.

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Hunt00
Reply.text: Do you have any work for me to do?

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Hunt00_npc0
Reply.text: The Hunting season is open. The more enemies you kill, the more money you get. We pay %3d coins for every cold body. You’ll get your reward when the hunt time is over.

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Hunt01
Reply.text: Do you have any work for me to do?

Reply.name: Dynamic00_Hunt01_npc0
Reply.text: The bandits have gone completely mad! Raiding our territory as if it were their own. Someone have to teach them a lesson. Shot a couple of them while the people are still angry and you'll get %3d coins for every cold body.
